remarks: Value of the adjoint function.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ajval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ajval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
ajval.3 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ajval.4 $e |- Q = ( .iOLD ` W ) $.
ajval.5 $e |- A = ( U adj W ) $.
ajval $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) -> ( A ` T ) = ( iota s ( s : Y --> X /\ A. x e. X A. y e. Y ( ( T ` x ) Q y ) = ( x P ( s ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d T s x y $.
$d U s x y $.
$d W s x y $.
$d X s x y $.
$d Y s y $.
